template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the education space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Research and create a multi-format campaign for a K-12 science platform that maintains consistent messaging across all channels and aims to increase teacher sign-ups by 15% this quarter.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants a single-sentence prompt in plain English for an education content campaign. Let me break down their requirements.

They mentioned the task must include research, multi-format creation, consistency, and measurable goals. I need to cover all these elements concisely.

First, the education space—so maybe target like K-12 educators or e-learning. Multi-format could mean blog posts, videos, social media. Consistency means maintaining the same message everywhere. Measurable goals might be engagement or lead generation.

Keep it under 45 words. Let me draft a sentence that ties all these together. Start with the action, include each component, and end with the goal. How about... "Research and create a multi-format content campaign for a K-12 science platform that maintains messaging consistency across all channels and aims to increase teacher sign-ups by 15% this quarter."

That hits research, multi-format, consistency, and a measurable goal. Check the word count—yeah, under 45. Sounds clear and covers everything they asked for.
